data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Longo, Gary C., Bernardi, Giacomo, Lea, Robert N. (2018): Taxonomic revisions within Embiotocidae (Teleostei, Perciformes) based on molecular phylogenetics. Zootaxa 4482 (3): 591-596, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4482.3.10
